titleStmt.title: An aduertisement and defence for trueth against her backbiters and specially against the whispring fauourers, and colourers of Campions, and the rest of his confederats treasons. 1581. God saue the Queene.

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 18259 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
